description:
Redevelopment of sites P3 and P4 to provide fifteen 1-bedroom flats, fifty six 2-bedroomed flats, five 3-bed houses and three 4-bedroomed houses. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  A794/P3-P4/3.001 REV BK,104 REV F,                         A794/P3,P4/3.104 REF F 1/05,                         A794/P3,4/4 1/011 REV E,1/012 REF E                         A794/P3,P4/4.1/013 REF F,1/014 REV                         A794/P3,P4/4.1/015 REV D,1/016 REV                         A794/P3,P4/4.1017 REV B,1/018 REV B                         A794/P3,P4/4.1/021 REV D,1/022 REV                         A794/P3-P4/4.1/023 REV C,1/024 REV
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
